body_content.explanation: in a way that relates or belongs to a college or its students :
examples: These young people have a lot ahead of them if they decide to compete either collegiately or professionally.
Collegiately, I played with a number of guys who are now professionals.

body_content.explanation: in a way that involves or shows friendly and helpful relationships between colleagues (= people who work together):
examples: Organizations that are already working collegiately could form a separate group to work with government in the development of policy.
Decisions were taken collegiately, so if any of the directors objected to a proposal, it was rejected.
